description: The man and woman are standing in front of a whiteboard. They are both wearing lab coats. They are writing on the whiteboard.
text:
Man: I think we should start a company that develops new technologies.
Woman: I agree. There's a lot of potential in that field.

description: The man and woman are sitting at a table. They are both wearing suits. They are looking at a laptop computer.
text:
Man: I think we have a solid business plan.
Woman: I agree. Let's start working on getting funding.

description: The man and woman are standing on a stage. They are both wearing business suits. They are giving a presentation to a group of people.
text:
Man: We are confident that our company will be successful.
Woman: We have a great team and a strong business plan.

description: The man and woman are sitting in an office. They are both wearing business suits. They are smiling and shaking hands.
text:
Man: We did it! We got the funding!
Woman: I'm so proud of us.

description: The man and woman are standing in front of a large building. The building has a sign that says "Acme Technologies" on it.
text:
Man: Welcome to Acme Technologies!
Woman: We're glad you're here.
